Notes.Text:
This update for ghostscript fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-28879: Fixed buffer Overflow in s_xBCPE_process (bsc#1210062).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: In Artifex Ghostscript through 10.01.0, there is a buffer overflow leading to potential corruption of data internal to the PostScript interpreter, in base/sbcp.c. This affects BCPEncode, BCPDecode, TBCPEncode, and TBCPDecode. If the write buffer is filled to one byte less than full, and one then tries to write an escaped character, two bytes are written.
